The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)

wikitext.*:
{{Stub}}
'''Oaths Fulfilled''' is the forty-fifth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the fifty-fifth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]].

== Synopsis ==
[[Gandalf]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] walk across the battlefield of [[Pelennor Fields]], finding [[Aragorn]], [[Gimli]] and [[Legolas]]. The [[King of the Dead]] demands to be releases which Gimli says is a bad idea, stating "Very handy in a tight spot these lads, despite the fact they're dead,". The King of the Dead reminds Aragorn that he had given him his word and Aragorn releases them then acknowledges Gandalf and Pippin.
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King scenes|55]]
